message: Bob, I have a fantastic opportunity for you! I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. I understand this product is worth $1000000 to you, and I'm willing to let it go for a price that's fair to both of us.  My offer is $900000. This represents a significant saving for you, and allows me to achieve a fair return on my investment. Please consider this offer carefully, as I'm confident this product will be a game-changer for you.
